synopsis.text: Mutsuki is heartbroken when she discovers that the old school building, a treasure trove of cherished memories, is set to be demolished by the high school administration. With the help of Chitose and the other devoted moms, a determined effort is launched to save the building from destruction. Amidst the struggle, Fumitsuki, Chitose, and Mutsuki find themselves on a journey of self-discovery, ultimately revealing their true emotions. Join this endearing group of characters as they fight to preserve the past and embrace their feelings in the touching anime, "Happy Lesson The Final."
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
